## ğŸ’¬ Ask Questions

Have a question? We'd love to help!

### GitHub Discussions

The best place for questions is [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/Luiz-Frias/agentic-codebase-navigator/discussions):

- ğŸ“ **Q&A**: Ask questions and get answers from the community
- ğŸ’¡ **Ideas**: Discuss feature ideas and use cases
- ğŸ“¢ **Announcements**: Stay updated on releases and changes
- ğŸ‰ **Show & Tell**: Share projects using RLM

## ğŸ› Report Bugs

Found a bug?

1. **Check existing issues**: Search [open issues](https://github.com/Luiz-Frias/agentic-codebase-navigator/issues) first
2. **Check the docs**: The [Troubleshooting](../docs/troubleshooting.md) guide might have the answer
3. **Open a new issue**: Use the [Bug Report](../issues/new?template=bug_report.yml) template

**For security vulnerabilities**: Please report privately via [GitHub Security Advisory](https://github.com/Luiz-Frias/agentic-codebase-navigator/security/advisories)

## âœ¨ Request Features

Have an idea for a new feature?

1. **Check existing issues**: Browse [open issues](https://github.com/Luiz-Frias/agentic-codebase-navigator/issues) and [discussions](https://github.com/Luiz-Frias/agentic-codebase-navigator/discussions)
2. **Open a discussion**: Start a [discussion](https://github.com/Luiz-Frias/agentic-codebase-navigator/discussions) to gauge interest
3. **Propose in an issue**: Use the [Feature Request](../issues/new?template=feature_request.yml) template

## ğŸš¨ Security Issues

If you discover a security vulnerability:

1. **Do NOT open a public issue**
2. **[Report privately](https://github.com/Luiz-Frias/agentic-codebase-navigator/security/advisories)** via GitHub Security Advisory
3. Or email **<contact.me@luizfrias.com>** with "[SECURITY]" in the subject

See [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) for full details.

## ğŸ“§ Contact

- **Email**: <contact.me@luizfrias.com>

## Response Times

We try to respond to issues and discussions as quickly as possible:

- **Critical bugs**: Within 24 hours
- **Regular bugs/questions**: Within 3-5 days
- **Feature requests**: Within 1-2 weeks

## Code of Conduct

This project is committed to a welcoming community. Please read our [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) before participating.
